lead_paragraph: Alison Chase, a founder of Pilobolus and Momix, presented four pieces in her company’s New York debut at the Miller Theater.
snippet: Alison Chase, a founder of Pilobolus and Momix, presented four pieces in her company’s New York debut at the Miller Theater.

headline.main: Branching Out, but Never Far From Its Roots
headline.seo: Alison Chase’s Troupe Has New York Debut at Miller Theater
